duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform maintenance, cleaning, and occasionally supervise janitorial volunteers.
Support the mission of The Salvation Army by cleaning all classrooms, common areas, and staircases, and setting up for various events.
Empty and clean trash cans, sweep and mop floors, clean bathrooms, and restock supplies for multiple areas.
Perform ongoing maintenance, including stripping, waxing, and buffing floors, as well as cleaning refrigerators and freezers.
Ensure all areas throughout the building are clean, orderly, and well-maintained.
Occasionally drive to support seasonal efforts and contribute to outdoor maintenance.
Inform Maintenance Coordinator when supplies need to be ordered and help unload food or other donations as requested.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED (Previous experience in related field preferred)
